cards.name: Dark Magician
cards.description: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

cards.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon
cards.description: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

cards.name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon
cards.description: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

cards.name: Summoned Skull
cards.description: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

cards.name: Dark Magician Girl
cards.description: This card gains 300 ATK for every 'Dark Magician' or 'Magician of Black Chaos' in the GY.

cards.name: Pot of Greed
cards.description: Draw 2 cards from your Deck.

cards.name: Monster Reborn
cards.description: Target 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it.

cards.name: Raigeki
cards.description: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

cards.name: Dark Hole
cards.description: Destroy all monsters on the field.

cards.name: Harpie's Feather Duster
cards.description: Destroy all Spell and Trap Cards your opponent controls.

cards.name: Mirror Force
cards.description: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsters.

cards.name: Infinite Impermanence
cards.description: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.

cards.name: Torrential Tribute
cards.description: When a monster(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsters on the field.

cards.name: Solemn Judgment
cards.description: When a monster would be Summoned, OR a Spell/Trap Card is activated: Pay half your LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy it.

cards.name: Call of the Haunted
cards.description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. When that monster is destroyed, destroy this card.

cards.name: Firewall Dragon
cards.description: 2+ monsters, except Tokens. Once per turn: You can target monsters on the field and/or GY up to the number of monsters co-linked to this card; return them to the hand.

cards.name: Accesscode Talker
cards.description: 2+ Effect Monsters. Gains 1000 ATK for each different Attribute among this card's materials. Cannot be targeted by opponent's card effects.

cards.name: Borrelsword Dragon
cards.description: 3+ Effect Monsters. Cannot be destroyed by battle. Once per turn (Quick Effect): You can target 1 Attack Position monster; change it to Defense Position, also this card can make a second attack during each Battle Phase this turn.

cards.name: Knightmare Phoenix
cards.description: 2+ monsters with different names. If this card is Link Summoned: You can discard 1 card, then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy it, then, if this card was co-linked when this effect was activated, you can draw 1 card.

cards.name: Sky Striker Ace - Kagari
cards.description: 1 non-FIRE monster. If this card is Link Summoned: You can target 1 "Sky Striker" Spell in your GY; add it to your hand. Gains 100 ATK for each Spell in your GY.
